channel.title: Implementing new hp bar
channel.description: does anyone know how to implement the new hp bar, like the one runescape has? along with the new splash numbers. ive seen it, but i do not know how to change it. and if you know how to change the game frame so it looks like the new runescape one, like it is now? thank you so very much! i knnow ive been posting alot of help questions, but im almost done with my server, so thank you ! its 508 berkyscape client btw
